text: Kristian Konstantinov Kostov (born 15 March 2000) is a Bulgarian-Kazakh singer born in Moscow. He has taken part in several competitions including The Voice Kids Russia, X Factor Bulgaria and the Eurovision Song Contest 2017, where represented Bulgaria with the song "Beautiful Mess", finishing in second place. == References == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian singers Category:Russian singers Category:21st-century Russian singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Moscow
title: Kristian Kostov
